entry.title: Current Conditions: -12.1°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Daniel's Harbour 2:30 PM NST Saturday 04 February 2023
Temperature: -12.1°C
Pressure / Tendency: 97.0 kPa falling
Humidity: 87 %
Wind Chill: -24
Dewpoint: -13.8°C
Wind: W 41 km/h gust 71 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Saturday: Flurries or snow squalls. High minus 9.
entry.summary: Flurries or snow squalls. Blowing snow. Local amount 5 cm. Wind southwest 60 km/h gusting to 80 except gusting to 100 along parts of the coast early this afternoon. High minus 9. Wind chill minus 28 this morning and minus 20 this afternoon. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 11:00 AM NST Saturday 04 February 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Flurries. Low minus 19 except minus 13 along parts of the coast.
entry.summary: Flurries ending this evening then partly cloudy. Blowing snow. Wind southwest 50 km/h gusting to 70 becoming northwest 60 gusting to 80 except gusting to 100 over exposed areas late this evening. Wind becoming northwest 40 gusting to 60 overnight. Low minus 19 except minus 13 along parts of the coast. Wind chill minus 17 this evening and minus 28 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 11:00 AM NST Saturday 04 February 2023

entry.title: Sunday: A mix of sun and cloud. High minus 15 except minus 9 along parts of the coast.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. Wind west 30 km/h gusting to 50. High minus 15 except minus 9 along parts of the coast. Wind chill minus 31 in the morning and minus 24 in the afternoon. Risk of frostbite. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 11:00 AM NST Saturday 04 February 2023
